## Acknowledgements

We acknowledge and appreciate the valuable contributions of the following organizations, which provide the data and imagery that power our website:

* The National Weather Service (NWS) for providing the surface analysis map
* The National Hurricane Center (NHC) for their seven-day hurricane forecast
* NASA for granting convenient access to the latest GOES (Geostationary Operational Environmental Satellite) imagery
* The European Centre for Medium-range Weather Forecast (ECMWF) for making the output of their Integrated Forecast System (IFS) openly available
